jobDescription: We are looking for a Content Analyst to help analyze and evaluate the performance of our content offerings. The ideal candidate will be passionate about movies and TV shows, and have a strong analytical mindset. This role will involve working with large datasets to uncover insights that drive business decisions.
jobResponsibility: Analyze viewing data to provide insights on the performance of Netflix content. Develop and maintain dashboards that visualize key metrics and trends. Collaborate with content teams to identify areas for improvement and opportunities for growth.
educationalRequirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent

jobDescription: We are seeking a Product Designer to help create and improve user experiences across Google products and services. The ideal candidate will have a passion for designing elegant and intuitive interfaces that solve complex user problems. This role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and translate them into effective design solutions.
jobResponsibility: Design and prototype user interfaces for web and mobile applications that meet user needs and business objectives. Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure that design solutions are feasible, viable, and desirable. Continuously iterate on designs based on user feedback and data analysis.
educationalRequirement: Bachelor's degree in Design, Computer Science, or equivalent
experiences: 5+ years of experience in product design
